com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast

Class FastEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.FastEncoderDecoder
      • com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.FastEncoder

  • public class FastEncoder
extends FastEncoderDecoder
    CameronFAST utility for encoding messages using FAST.

    Run with no arguments for usage.

    This is a useful utility, however its main purpose is to illustrate the use of the key CameronFAST classes for encoding your messages using FAST. These classes can be used similarly to integrate FAST capability directly into your own applications.

        public static List<String> readerToStringList(Reader rd)

        Read the entire content of a Reader into a List of String objects, one String for each line.
        Parameters:
        rd - The Reader object to read from.
        Returns:
        List of String objects. Never null but may be empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs when reading
